subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Defending champion Spain took a 1-0 lead against the United States in the Davis Cup quarterfinals on Friday as Feliciano Lopez defeated Mardy Fish, 6-4, 3-6, 6-3, 6-7 (2), 8-6, in Austin, Tex.
snippet: Defending champion Spain took a 1-0 lead against the United States in the Davis Cup quarterfinals on Friday as Feliciano Lopez defeated Mardy Fish, 6-4, 3-6, 6-3, 6-7 (2), 8-6, in Austin, Tex.
